Synopsis:

The Iron Ladies is the name of the team of transvestites and transsexuals 
who became famous in Thailand for winning the national men&#039;s volleyball championships. 
However on one gloomy day after their win, the team splits into two. Nong heads on 
faction and creates his own team with the financial support of Kitti. Joining his team 
is April, May and June as weel as Nhong, the gigantic gay guy who is Nong&#039;s new buddy.
Meanwhile the original team seems to have lost its touch and suffers a series of defeats. 
In the national Thailand league, Nong&#039;s team goes head to head against the original 
Iron Ladies team and beats them three times. Nong argues incessantly with Jung; 
the two former best friends are now bitter enemies, hurling insults at each other.
Jung and Chai decide to make a journey to Xishung Banla in China to see Pia, 
the beauty queen who&#039;s now making a career out of being a showgirl.
It&#039;s not just a long rough trip to meet a friend. It&#039;s also full of sweet, spicy 
and hilarious memories of the early years when they first met at university.
